domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse You NEVER paid ANY attention to Native Americans before.

YOU are using them now as a distraction!

The disproportionate devastation COVID-19 is having on Native Americans lays bare the U.S. govt’s systemic failure to meet its trust & treaty obligations.
https://t.co/QjiN9qPxbx
